reviews.review_msg: One of the funniest and most interesting professors I've ever had. The random sex stories are awesome. Presentations were fair and midterm paper was quite fair. If you do well on the MT (which almost everyone does), then the mark is shifted to your final as well. The class is really as easy as everyone says if you put in the effort.
SUPER EASY. EASY AS EDUC ELECTIVES lol
A great 3rd year course to take for upper div. credit. Not overly difficult if you keep up. Interesting material. Play the game, and walk away with a good mark.

Very interesting fellow. He's lived a full life and knows lots, his anecdotes and stories are the best part of class. I learned so much. As a mature student, take it from me when u go out in the world its profs like this u remember and who really teach you the most. Plus, course was pretty darn easy and didn't consist of a lot of work.

BOOORING!!!  This guy is unorganized and unclear.  He rants A LOT.  It is soo hard to stay awake.  He forgets what he's talking about, so your notes are full of holes.  He's not a bad guy, but he sure is dull.  Also, he will belittle students in front of the class if they answer incorrectly or do a poor presentation.  Skip 301.  It's not worth it.
Interesting course for non-crim students, probably because of his constant sexual references.  Not marked super hard and very informative.
very interesting class... although I found it hard to pay attention without drooling uncontrollably ;) always made time for me... good times in his office hrs =P
Ehor is a great prof. His lectures are always interesting and he is smoking hot!
